name: Chicken Invaders: Revenge of the Yolk
name_original: Chicken Invaders: Revenge of the Yolk
description:
Chicken Invaders: Revenge of the Yolk is an arcade game developed by InterAction studios. It was originally released in 2006. InterAction studios published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Chicken Invaders: Revenge of the Yolk is available on PC.
